    @Service
@Transactional(propagation=REQUIRED,
               readOnly=false)
public class AddressService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAddressService
    Created by alexanderleonovich on 01.09.15. Service class, for do operations with Address entity on Service layer In this class entity convert to DTO object
